General.Name: Shenzhen Sea Star Technology
General.Description: Shenzhen Sea Star Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, provides SaaS services in China. The company offers advertising and digital marketing, big data risk control technology, and artificial technology services. It also manufactures electronics products; supplies lighting products; and invests in funds. The company was formerly known as Shen Zhen Mindata Holding Co., Ltd and changed its name to Shenzhen Sea Star Technology Co., Ltd. in March 2021. Shenzhen Sea Star Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
General.Address: Xinhao E Du Building, Shenzhen, China, 518048
